test-case.name: fn-contains2args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "contains" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:contains(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-contains2args-2
test-case.description: Evaluates The "contains" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(mid range) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:contains(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-contains2args-3
test-case.description: Evaluates The "contains" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound)
test-case.test: fn:contains(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-contains2args-4
test-case.description: Evaluates The "contains" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(mid range)
test-case.test: fn:contains(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: fn-contains2args-5
test-case.description: Evaluates The "contains" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(upper bound)
test-case.test: fn:contains(xs:string("This is a characte"),xs:string("This is a characte"))

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains()`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains(())`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains((), (), "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("foo", "foo", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint")`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("tattoo", "t")`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(contains("tattoo", "ttt"))`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("", ())`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("a string", ())`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `contains("foo", "foo")`.

test-case.name: K-ContainsFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(contains("", "a string"))`.

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-1
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-2
test-case.description: Compare two values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-3
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case().

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-4
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-5
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: K2-ContainsFunc-6
test-case.description: Compare two non-matching values returned from fn:lower-case() and fn:upper-case().

test-case.name: cbcl-contains-001
test-case.description: test fn:contains with collation and $arg2 as empty string

test-case.name: cbcl-contains-002
test-case.description: test fn:contains with collation and $arg1 as empty string Author: Tim Mills

test-case.name: cbcl-contains-003
test-case.description: test evaluation of fn:contains to exactly one item Author: Tim Mills

test-case.name: liam-contains-001
test-case.description: Check for presence of HTML ascii case-insensitive collation

test-case.name: liam-contains-002
test-case.description: Check for presence of HTML ascii case-insensitive collation

test-case.name: liam-contains-003
test-case.description: Check HTML ascii case-insensitive collation with non-ascii value

test-case.name: liam-contains-004
test-case.description: Check HTML ascii case-insensitive collation with non-ascii value differing in case; should fail to match

modified.change: Made test name unique (was liam-contains-001). Added XP31 dependency.
